exits.D4: You have a pair of hedge trimmers! Type 'use trimmers' to trim through the thin hedge.

actions.USE: The hedge is too thick to use here. Plus I dont know how to code a verb, object, direct-object statement yet.

exits.C1: You have a flashlight in your backpack that you can use here!

actions.USE: You turn the flashlight on. Go ahead and proceed eastward.
